issue.title: [CF 351] Icon highlighting (colored border) on "keybinding" button press.
issue.body:
Icon highlighting (colored border) on "keybinding" button press.  Would let icons completely mimic action bar buttons visually.

http://www.wowinterface.com/downloads/fileinfo.php?id=10855#comments


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #351 | Raw

comments.body:
Sorry, but no.
